Title: On the Run
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven and Amethyst try out life on the road. Steven gets tired of it soon, so Amethyst takes him to a forgotten canyon called "The Nursery", that holds the dark secret of her origin.
